Name: Town of Luang Prabang
Description: Town of Luang Prabang - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Well-preserved historic town with blend of traditional Lao and French colonial architecture.

Name: Vat Phou and Associated Ancient Settlements within the Champasak Cultural Landscape
Description: Vat Phou and Associated Ancient Settlements - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Khmer temple complex and associated settlements from 5th-15th centuries.

Name: Megalithic Jar Sites in Xiengkhuang - Plain of Jars
Description: Megalithic Jar Sites in Xiengkhuang - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Archaeological landscape with thousands of stone jars from Iron Age.
